Thought: Based on the ingredients you have, here are some recipes you can make:

1. [Napoleon - A Creamy Puff Pastry Cake](https://spoonacular.com/recipes/napoleon-a-creamy-puff-pastry-cake-652952)

2. [Breadnut Cakes](https://spoonacular.com/recipes/breadnut-cakes-636022)
   You'll need 2/3 teaspoon of baking powder and 1/2 ounce of butter or margarine.

3. [Strawberry Sponge Pie](https://spoonacular.com/recipes/strawberry-sponge-pie-664870)
   You'll need 1 quart of strawberries and 1 unbaked pie shell.

4. [Lemon Cupcakes](https://spoonacular.com/recipes/lemon-cupcakes-649593)
